reviewText: It's what I saw on the net. It was free. I bought because is really good info.

I am just starting out with horseshoe pitching.  I found this DVD very helpful as an introduction to the fundamentals.  If you are an experienced pitcher you may not find it very useful, unless you have a flaw in your delivery.  But to me it was (is) very useful.  It is reasonably will produced and Walter Williams presents some good points.
That's what you're doing when you learn to pitch from this "pro."  Now if I can get my "muscle memory" to remember better....
